title: give获得物品的字体
author: Sparklets小星
txt_content: 1.12.2原版，give指令给的物品改的名字和描述怎么把斜字体改成正字体。/give @p minecraft:wooden_axe 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:999,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"小木斧",Lore:["【至臻】"]},Unbreakable:1,ench:[{id:70,lvl:1}]}

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content: setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"右击\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:\\\"give @p minecraft:wooden_axe 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:999,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:\\\\\\\"generic.attackDamage\\\\\\\",Name:CBC},{Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:\\\\\\\"generic.attackSpeed\\\\\\\",Name:CBC}],display:{Name:\\\\\\\"\\u00a7r小木斧\\\\\\\",Lore:[\\\\\\\"\\u00a7r【至臻】\\\\\\\"]},Unbreakable:1b,ench:[{id:70s,lvl:1s}]}\\\"}\"}}"}

replies.author: 锅宝
replies.txt_content:
请尝试在lore的内容前面加上§o
例如
Lore:["§o【至臻】"]}
游戏内按住ALT再依次按下1,6,7松开ALT即可打出§

replies.author: Ruainbow_
replies.txt_content:
楼上，游戏里怎么打分节符，被禁的。
1.12的正确用法是建立函数，并在函数中输入需要give命令，然后在需要的地方直接输入或粘贴分节符§
或者使用
www.ganxiaozhe.com
中的彩色命令转化功能，只需要在命令方块中输入转化后的命令，将获得的牌子放下，然后点击牌子即会出现一个能give彩色名字的命令方块。

replies.author: Sparklets小星
replies.txt_content:
